thread.section_title: Hotel Le Clos Medicis - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Charming hotel on the airport train line
thread.title_full: Charming hotel on the airport train line - Review of Hotel Le Clos Medicis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AMviajes
title: Charming hotel on the airport train line
text: Very convenient train access from the CDG airport line. I upgraded to a superior (or deluxe?) room and the room was spacious - for Paris - and very comfortable. Good windows and light. Good shower water pressure and temperature. Wifi was good, though I had trouble connecting one night when it seemed to be down. The lobby had lovely wood beams across the ceiling and plenty of cozy seating (nice place to wait for your room to be ready).
